mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review (review_no, user_id, review_content, review_title, order_code, product_title, star_point, product_code) values(seq_review_reviewno.nextval, #{user_id}, #{review_content}, #{review_title}, #{order_code}, #{product_title}, #{star_point}, #{product_code})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_review a
order by review_no desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select o.*, d.product_code, p.product_title from tbl_order o
inner join tbl_order_detail d on o.order_code = d.order_code
inner join tbl_product p on d.product_code = p.product_code
where o.order_code = #{order_code}
